entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:59 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending near midnight then partly cloudy. A few thunderstorms early this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
